data.content: Lielu Nishmas my Father-in-laws Yahrzeil Avraham Lake ben Meir Halevi

data.heading: Turning of the daf
data.content: Sponsored by the MDY Tehillim group - for all who need Shidduchim, Refuas and Yeshuos, Please join us at tehillim.8mindat.com

data.heading: Chaim & Sarah Cohen
data.content: In honor of our parents' 50th anniversary. May Hashem bless them with many more years of health and happiness.

data.heading: Yeshiva Ohr Torah
data.content: Supporting Torah education in our community. Building tomorrow's leaders today.

data.heading: Refuah Shleima
data.content: For a complete recovery for Moshe ben Rachel and all cholei Yisrael
